alert.note: Alert for Grady; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Grady and southwestern McClain Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1030 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Middleberg to 3 miles north of Alex to 3 miles east of Agawam. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lindsay, Goldsby, Dibble, Washington, Cole, Alex, Bradley, Middleberg, Tabler, Criner, Agawam and Payne. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 101 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
